pkgmetadata.longdescription: Autologistic and Automultinomial Spatial Regression and Variable Selection // Contains functions for autologistic variable selection and parameter estimation for spatially correlated categorical data (including k2). The main function is MPLE. Capable of fitting the centered autologistic model described in Caragea and Kaiser (2009)doi:10.1198/jabes.2009.07032, as well as the traditional autologistic model of Besag (1974)http://www.jstor.org/stable/2984812.
